# gx-group

Web Component where you can group related elements of a form field

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description                                                                                                                                                                                             | Type      |
| ---------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `autoGrow` | `auto-grow` | This attribute defines if the control size will grow automatically, to adjust to its content size. If set to `false`, it won't grow automatically and it will show scrollbars if the content overflows. | `boolean` |
| `caption`  | `caption`   | Attribute that provides the caption to the <legend> tag                                                                                                                                                 | `string`  |
